title: SHAKE_GAMEPLAY_CAM
content:
0xFD55E49555E017CF0xF2EFE660// ShakeGameplayCam
void SHAKE_GAMEPLAY_CAM(char* shakeName, float intensity);Parameters:shakeName: The name of the shake.intensity: The intensity of the shake.Shakes the gameplay cam with the specified shake name and intensity.List of camera shake names:ASSAULT_RIFLE_RECOIL_SHAKE
